title: Adobe Target Classification Fields
description: A set of meta-data fields that will classify Target activities and experiences.

xdm:activityName.title: Activity Name
xdm:activityName.description: The name of the Target activity.

xdm:experienceName.title: Experience Name
xdm:experienceName.description: The name of the Target experience.

xdm:activityExperience.title: Activity Experience
xdm:activityExperience.description: Target Activity name concatenated with experience name.

xdm:thirdID.title: Third ID
xdm:thirdID.description: The third ID of the classification record.

xdm:analyticsReporting.title: Analytics Reporting
xdm:analyticsReporting.description: The reporting type associated with the Target activity.

xdm:activeDates.title: Active Dates
xdm:activeDates.description: The date of Target activity activation.

xdm:controlExperience.title: Control Experience
xdm:controlExperience.description: The experience set as control experience in the Target activity.

xdm:algorithmID.title: Algorithm ID
xdm:algorithmID.description: The identity of the algorithm used in the Target activity.

xdm:controlVsTargeted.title: Control VS Targeted
xdm:controlVsTargeted.description: The traffic allocation type for the Target activity.

xdm:trafficTypeID.title: Traffic Type ID
xdm:trafficTypeID.description: The identity of the traffic type associated with Target activity.
